content.raw:
Until now we developed our solution in a docker container. To be prepared for the submission process I now wanted to install the ignition version following the [catkin installation](#!/osrf/subt/wiki/tutorials/SystemSetupInstall). Launching the first tunnel as described in point 5 brought me this world:

![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/8ze6Mjd/images/3981373440-Bildschirmfoto_von_2019-09-23_23-11-34.png)
Neither the staging area nor the robot is shown. And the tunnel walls look strange. If the deadline for the submission would not be so near, it would be funny :-\(

Any idea what is going wrong here?

‌

During the startup I get error message regarding the ros-bridge:

`ERROR: cannot launch node of type [ros1_ign_bridge/parameter_bridge]: ros1_ign_bridge` eight times 

and 

`ERROR: cannot launch node of type [ros1_ign_image/image_bridge]: ros1_ign_image `once. 

And what is reason for this problem?

Neither the staging area nor the robot is shown. And the tunnel walls look strange. If the deadline for the submission would not be so near, it would be funny :-(
